sms_batches_create_need_credits: You do not have enough credit to send SMS messages. Please top up your account.
sms_batches_create_error: An error has occurred creating the campaign. {{error}}
sms_advice_info: It is best to use alphabetical characters as a sender name for sending SMS messages. You can avoid certain operator filters on digital senders, namely mobile numbers.
sms_advice_description_1: Alphabetical sender customisation is offered by OVHcloud, and you can request it via
sms_advice_description_3: (automatic validation is immediate, manual validation is carried out within 24-48 hours).
sms_receivers_error_pattern: The recipient number must be in an international format.
sms_message_characters_left_warning_8bit: Your message contains one or more special characters.
sms_message_alert_maxlength: You have exceeded the limit of 255 SMS messages.
sms_message_stop_info_end: is added to the end of the SMS.
sms_message_stop_description: For legal reasons, your SMS will only be sent between 08:00 and 20:00, from Monday to Friday.
sms_no_stop_clause_label: I certify that the SMS is not for advertising purposes, and request for the STOP message to be removed.
sms_batches_create_message_stop_descript: For legal reasons, commercial SMS messages will only be sent between 08:00 and 20:00, from Monday to Friday.
sms_message_commercial_description: For legal reasons, commercial SMS messages will only be sent between 08:00 and 20:00, from Monday to Friday.
sms_no_commercial_clause_label: I formally certify that the SMS is not commercial.
sms_sender_option_short_number: Numbers that allow for replies (France only)
sms_add_receivers_choice_select_lists: Select the files containing the recipients:
sms_add_contacts_choice_info: To send SMS campaigns, it is best to use a CSV file listing all of the recipients.
sms_message_estimation_note_1: The cost will vary depending on the destinations you are sending messages to.
sms_message_estimation_note_3: Please note that this value is just an estimated guideline.
